# API Reference for cdktf.Testing

   Testing <a name="Testing" id="cdktf.Testing"></a>
  
  Testing utilities for cdktf applications.
  
  # Initializers <a name="Initializers" id="cdktf.Testing.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  cdktf.NewTesting() Testing
  ```
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |

  ## `App` <a name="App" id="cdktf.Testing.app"></a>
  
  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  cdktf.Testing_App(options TestingAppOptions) App
  ```
  
  Returns an app for testing with the following properties: - Output directory is a temp dir.
  
  ### `options`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="options" id="cdktf.Testing.app.parameter.options"></a>
  
  - *Type:* <a href="#cdktf.TestingAppOptions">TestingAppOptions</a>
  
  ---

  ## `Synth` <a name="Synth" id="cdktf.Testing.synth"></a>
  
  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  cdktf.Testing_Synth(stack TerraformStack, runValidations *bool) *string
  ```
